name: National Hero Football
description:
Well, let's just say I was hooked to soccer the very first moment I stepped foot on the pitch. I was 4 years old and I had big dreams. Little talent but big dreams. When I learned how to code with my first computer some 25 years ago, I added another passion. Now I combined them and NATIONAL HERO is the result I'm so proud of. It's a game about the most beautiful sport in the world, made by a fan. And I hope you will love this game just as much as I do.


COST
There are no hidden fees. You can load and test the game for free. If you like it and you would like to continue your manager career beyond the testing period, you can buy it. It's a one-time purchase so no subscription required.


ICONS & PICTURES
All icons & pictures used in this game were downloaded from https://www.flaticon.com/
